text: The only people who never fail are those who never try.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
Yesterday is a memory, tomorrow is a hope, but most importantly, today is a reality which should be done well.
Find someone who does not need to ask for anything, but you are willing to give everything.
Live to give as much as you can, not to receive as much as you can.
